summary: The diff implements the requested navigation and section removals: App now renders only Home, About, Contact; NavBar contains only Home/About plus Get in Touch CTA (desktop and mobile); Home hero CTAs scroll only to About/Contact; Footer removes Quick Links and Contact info and keeps a single Instagram link with correct URL and security attributes. One extra, unrequested footer attribution/link was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Added footer attribution/link to caffeine.ai and changed copyright year/message
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-19 only requested removing Quick Links/Contact and keeping a single Instagram link; it did not request adding external attribution content/links or changing the copyright line.
